CustomField.description: Enables Live View. Also, only one DebugEntry per Logger.log('message') or Logger.logException will be saved, push() and pop() will be ignored.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables Live View. Also, only one DebugEntry per Logger.log('message') or Logger.logException will be saved, push() and pop() will be ignored.
CustomField.label: Log Messages Only / Live View
